content: p 1 tan i s swish scarf by tanis lavallée by tanis lavallée i designed this scarf to highlight a very special skein of dk weight yarn that i had been saving for a worthy project i decided that my first brioche design was worthy indeed this pattern is a great introduction to 2 colour brioche you will master increases as well as right and left leaning decreases and will be ready to tackle something more ambitious on your next brioche adventure © tanis fiber arts 2022 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com swish scarf p 2 tan i s size finished scarf is approx 8 wide and 66 long length is easily modified yarn by tanis lavallée 100 g of dk weight yarn in each of 2 coordinating colours sample shown features tfa purewash dk in mc ooak and cc charcoal gauge 20 sts and 20 row = 4 square in brioche stitch brioche stitch is super stretchy and gauge is not critical for this scarf yardage requirements and finished length will vary if gauge differs greatly from mine 2011 needles 4mm and 4 5mm 16 circular needle additional tools and materials tapestry needle stitch marker abbreviations rs right side ws wrong side k knit p purl sl slip_stitch as if to knit with yarn in front wyif with yarn in front wyib with yarn in back brk brioche knit by knitting the stitch that was slipped in the previous row together with its yarn over brp brioche purl by purling the stitch that was slipped in the previous row together with its yarn over sl1yo following k or brk slip 1 yarn over bring the working yarn under the needle to the front of the work slip the next stitch purlwise then bring the yarn over the needle and over the slipped stitch to the back in position to work the following stitch the slipped stitch with its yarn over is considered one stitch sl1yo following p or brp slip 1 yarn over working yarn is already in front slip the next stitch purlwise then bring the yarn over the needle and over the slipped stitch then to the front under the needle into position to work the following stitch the slipped stitch with its yarn over is considered one stitch brkyobrk 2-stitch increase brk1 and leave stitch on the needle yo then brk1 into same stitch 2 stitches increased brlsl decrease left-slanting 2-stitch decrease slip 1 stitch knitwise brk the following two stitches together then pass the slipped stitch over brrsl decrease right-slanting 2-stitch decrease slip the first stitch knitwise knit the next stitch pass the slipped stitch over place stitch on left hand needle and pass the following stitch over then place stitch back on right hand needle © tanis fiber arts 2022 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com swish scarf p 3 tan i s notes * brioche knitting uses all the
